data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module groups together several checkbuttons in a frame, and
    associates their state with a single list reference. Groups of
    checkbuttons are commonly needed in user interfaces, but Perl/Tk
    provides no easy method to create them.

    I also have a similar Tk::RadiobuttonGroup widget I would like to
    add.

    I am uploading this module to my user directory.
